conversations.body_text: Hi Julien Puntonet,     Your parcel is currently undergoing customs clearance and should be delivered to you shortly. https://www.sf-international.com/gb/en/support/querySupport/waybill?No=SF3289246496706
Hello     I see in the tracking with UPS that the parcel is returning to the sender, as you can see on the screenshot attached.     Do you have more info?     Thank you

Hi Julien Puntonet,    The parcel has been returned by customs for unknown reasons. We have instructed the courier company to issue a replacement and resend it to you. We apologise for any inconvenience caused.  https://www.sf-international.com/gb/sc/support/querySupport/waybill?No=SF3237026714685

Hi

Thank you for the update
No problems i'll wait for the new parcel


Le mar. 9 sept. 2025, 12:38, service@simsonn.com
